page.title: 04FORDAM BROWNIES
page.content: Brownies start at 6.30pm and goes on until 8.00pm. Mrs Briton and Mrs Ward and Miss Ward organise Brownies. It is held at the village hall every Monday. You have to be 7 when you start and you leave when you are 10 and a half.They play games and prepare to be examined for badges. The packs are elves, pixies, lepricorns, and gnomes. One pack has to make the drinks, and another pack has to clean the bus shelter.There are 24 girls who belong to Brownies, coming from Eight Ash Green and Fordham.
